publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1219.1 Nicola Sturgeon: Reducing Reoffending - Improving the Effectiveness of Custodial and Non-Custodial Sentences-As an amendment to motion (S2M-1219) in the name of Cathy Jamieson, insert at end "but is, as yet, not persuaded of the case for a single national correctional agency."
